item.title: 日本央行将暗示更多加息，因日元贬值与政治因素助推通胀风险
item.description: 日本央行预计将于周五上调经济增长预期，并释放进一步加息的信号。近期日元贬值及强劲薪资增长前景促使政策制定者保持警惕，以遏制通胀压力。【原文：The Bank of Japan is expected to raise its growth forecast on Friday and signal its readiness to hike interest rates further, as recent yen falls and prospects of solid wage gains keep policymakers alert to containing inflationary pressure.】

item.title: 台湾表示将与美国共同引领"民主"高科技供应链
item.description: 台湾首席谈判代表周二表示，台湾旨在与美国建立"民主"高科技供应链，并在上周与华盛顿达成的关税协议框架下形成战略性人工智能伙伴关系。【原文：Taiwan aims to build a "democratic" high-tech supply chain with the United States and form a strategic AI partnership under the new tariffs deal it sealed with Washington last week, Taipei's top negotiator in the talks said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 随着美国订单减少，中国销售人员在新市场面临艰苦奋斗
item.description: 2025年，中国出口商品创历史新高，但出口销售员陈艾米表示，这是她近二十年职业生涯中最艰难的一年。【原文：China sold more goods to the world than ever in 2025, but export saleswoman Aimee Chen says it was the hardest of her roughly two-decade career.】

item.title: 股市下跌，美元承压，特朗普的格陵兰岛计划引发市场震荡
item.description: 周二亚洲股市下跌，美元持续承压，美国国债收益率攀升至逾四个月高位。贸易战担忧再度升温打击了市场风险偏好，引发美国资产抛售潮。【原文：Asian stocks fell on Tuesday, while the dollar remained under pressure and the U.S. Treasury yields climbed to their highest level in more than four months, as a resurgence of trade-war concerns hit risk sentiment and sparked selling in U.S. assets.】

item.title: 油价因中国经济数据向好而上涨；格陵兰岛成为焦点
item.description: 周二油价上涨，因中国经济增长数据好于预期提振需求乐观情绪，同时市场密切关注特朗普总统因欲购买格陵兰岛而威胁对欧洲国家加征关税的动向。【原文：Oil prices rose on Tuesday after better-than-expected economic growth ​data from China lifted demand optimism, with markets also watching President Donald Trump's threats of ‌increased U.S. tariffs on European nations over his desire to buy Greenland.】

item.title: 外汇市场美元跌至周内低点，地缘政治因素重燃"抛售美国"交易浪潮
item.description: 周二早盘交易中，美元跌至一周低点，此前白宫就格陵兰岛未来归属问题对欧盟发出威胁，引发美国股市和国债的全面抛售。【原文：The dollar retreated to its lowest level in a week ‌in early trading on Tuesday after threats from the White House towards the European Union over the future of Greenland triggered a broad selloff across U.S. stocks and government bonds.】

item.title: 据Semafor报道，露露柠檬创始人奇普·威尔逊在代理权争夺战中寻求罢免Advent资本管理公司。
item.description: 据Semafor周一报道，知情人士透露，露露柠檬创始人奇普·威尔逊正试图将私募股权公司Advent从这家服装制造商的董事会中剔除，此举是正在进行的代理权争夺战的一部分。【原文：Lululemon founder Chip Wilson is trying to excise private equity firm Advent from the apparel maker's board as part of an ongoing proxy fight, Semafor reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 泰勒·斯威夫特所属唱片公司环球音乐集团与中国网易云音乐达成授权协议
item.description: 美国环球音乐集团与中国音乐流媒体服务网易云音乐达成合作协议，两家音乐公司于周一宣布了这一消息。【原文：U.S.-based Universal Music Group struck a deal with Chinese music streaming service NetEase Cloud Music, the two music companies announced Monday.】

item.title: 英国议员称金融服务行业需进行"人工智能压力测试"
item.description: 英国跨党派议员团体周二表示，英国金融监管机构未能充分阻止人工智能损害消费者权益或破坏市场稳定，敦促监管机构摒弃所谓"观望"态度。【原文：Britain’s financial watchdogs are not doing enough to stop artificial intelligence from harming consumers or destabilising markets, a cross‑party group of lawmakers said on Tuesday, urging regulators to move away from what it called a “wait and see” approach.】

item.title: 兰德斯塔德调查显示，年轻工作者最担心人工智能影响就业
item.description: 兰德斯塔德周二公布的一项调查显示，五分之四的员工认为人工智能将影响其日常工作任务，其中Z世代最为担忧。随着企业日益依赖人工智能聊天机器人和自动化技术，这种担忧正日益加剧。【原文：Four in five workers believe artificial intelligence is going to impact their daily tasks at the workplace, with Gen Z among those most concerned as companies increasingly rely on AI chatbots and automation, a survey conducted by Randstad showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 必和必拓报告上半年铁矿石产量创纪录，暗示价格让步
item.description: 必和必拓集团周二表示，在与中国进行年度合同谈判时，已接受部分铁矿石价格下调，同时该公司报告称，这种关键炼钢原料上半年产量创下历史新高。【原文：BHP Group has accepted lower prices for some iron ore during annual contract negotiations with China, it said on Tuesday, as it reported record first-half production of the key steelmaking ingredient.】

item.title: 巴西最高法院批准冻结投资者内尔松·塔努雷的资产
item.description: 巴西最高法院法官迪亚斯·托福利已批准检察官要求银行冻结巴西企业家纳尔逊·塔努雷资产的请求，此举源于对贷款机构Banco Master的调查。相关文件于上周五公开。【原文：Brazil's Supreme Court Justice Dias Toffoli has allowed a prosecutor's request for banks to freeze assets belonging to Brazilian entrepreneur Nelson Tanure due to an investigation into lender Banco Master, according to a document made public last Friday.】

item.title: 首席执行官对营收信心跌至五年低点——普华永道调查
item.description: 根据专业服务集团普华永道周一发布的一项全球调查，仅有三成首席执行官对公司未来一年的营收增长前景表示乐观，该比例创下五年来的最低水平。【原文：Only three in 10 chief executives are confident in their companies' revenue growth prospects over the next year, the lowest level in five years, according to a global survey by professional services group PwC released on Monday.】

item.title: 马来西亚国库控股首席执行官在达沃斯表示将向电网和芯片企业注入更多资本
item.description: 马来西亚主权财富基金国库控股有限公司首席执行官周一告诉路透社，随着人工智能推动新一轮投资周期，该基金计划投入更多资金加强电力系统建设并支持本土半导体企业。【原文：Malaysia's sovereign wealth fund Khazanah Nasional Bhd plans to channel more capital into strengthening the power system and supporting local semiconductor firms as AI drives the next investment cycle, its chief told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 巴里克黄金公司任命蔡海伦为首席财务官
item.description: 巴里克黄金公司周一宣布任命蔡海伦为首席财务官，自3月1日起生效。她将接替格雷厄姆·舒特沃斯，后者将在2月5日公司公布年度业绩后离职。【原文：Barrick Mining on Monday named Helen Cai as chief financial officer, effective March 1, to succeed Graham Shuttleworth, who will be leaving after the company reports its year-end results on February 5.】

item.title: OpenAI首席财务官表示，公司年化收入将在2025年突破200亿美元。
item.description: OpenAI首席财务官莎拉·弗里尔周日在一份博客文章中表示，该公司2025年的年化收入已突破200亿美元，较2024年的60亿美元大幅增长，其增长轨迹与计算能力的扩张密切相关。【原文：OpenAI Chief Financial Officer Sarah Friar said in a blog post on Sunday the company's annualized revenue has surpassed $20 billion in 2025, up from $6 billion in 2024 with growth closely tracking an expansion in computing capacity.】

item.title: 英国赌博委员会称Meta对非法赌博广告"视而不见"
item.description: 英国赌博委员会周一表示，拥有Facebook和Instagram的Meta Platforms公司对非法在线赌场在其平台上投放广告的行为视而不见，这表明该公司乐于继续从犯罪分子手中牟利。【原文：Britain's Gambling Commission said on Monday that Meta Platforms , the owner of Facebook and Instagram, was turning a blind eye to illegal online casinos advertising on its sites, indicating it was happy to continue taking money from criminals.】

item.title: 意大利时装设计师华伦天奴去世，享年93岁
item.description: 意大利时装设计师瓦伦蒂诺·加拉瓦尼已逝世，其基金会周一宣布。【原文：Italian fashion designer Valentino Garavani has died, his foundation said on Monday.】

item.title: 《纽约时报》报道称，特朗普将在法院采取行动后迅速取消关税
item.description: 美国贸易代表杰米森·格里尔在周一发表的《纽约时报》专访中表示，若最高法院推翻总统依据紧急法案实施的全球性关税措施，特朗普政府将立即启动新的关税政策。【原文：The administration of President Donald Trump would enact new tariffs almost immediately if the Supreme Court struck down sweeping global tariffs the president launched under an emergency law, U.S. Trade Representative Jamieson Greer told the New York Times in an interview published on Monday.】

item.title: 特朗普因格陵兰问题对欧洲发出关税威胁，重燃"卖美国"贸易议题讨论
item.description: 随着格陵兰岛问题引发的紧张局势升级，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普再度对欧洲盟友发出关税威胁，这重新唤起了人们对"卖美国"贸易的讨论——该话题源于去年四月特朗普在解放日宣布实施全面关税后的余波。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's renewed tariff threats against European allies amid rising tension over Greenland have revived talk of the 'Sell America' trade that emerged in the aftermath of his sweeping Liberation Day levies last April.】

item.title: 沙特私营部门在达沃斯论坛上表示将承担更大《2030愿景》角色
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯经济部长费萨尔·易卜拉欣向路透社表示，该国正将部分"2030愿景"项目的实施范围移交私营部门，同时调整项目时间表以避免经济过热。【原文：Saudi Arabia is handing the scope of some Vision 2030 projects to the private sector as it adjusts timelines to avoid economic overheating, Economy Minister Faisal al-Ibrahim told Reuters.】

item.title: 加拿大央行调查显示，加拿大商业信心持续低迷
item.description: 作者：普罗米特·穆克吉和大卫·吕格伦【原文：By Promit Mukherjee and David Ljunggren】

item.title: 宜家最大零售商称价格稳定性至关重要，因消费者寻求稳定
item.description: 全球最大宜家特许经营商首席执行官周一告诉路透社，保持定价一致性、避免过度反应对零售商至关重要，因为顾客正寻求稳定性。【原文：Maintaining consistency and not over-reacting on pricing is key for retailers as customers seek stability, the CEO of the biggest global IKEA franchisee told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 纽约证券交易所母公司洲际交易所开发全天候代币化证券交易平台
item.description: 洲际交易所周一宣布，已开发出一个代币化证券的交易和链上结算平台，旨在满足全球对美国股票的需求。【原文：Intercontinental Exchange said on Monday that it had developed a platform for trading and on-chain settlement of tokenized securities, in a move to capitalize on global demand for U.S. equities.】

item.title: 独家：特朗普上任首年 德国对美投资近半数缩水
item.description: 德国经济研究所（IW）周一发布的一份报告显示，在特朗普总统第二任期首年，受贸易不确定性和关税上调影响，德国企业对美国的投资和出口出现萎缩。【原文：German companies pulled back on investment and exports to ​the U.S. during the first year of ‌President Donald Trump's second term, hit by trade uncertainty and higher tariffs, according to a report by the German Economic Institute (IW) seen by Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: Revolut申请秘鲁银行牌照以扩大拉丁美洲业务版图
item.description: 英国金融科技公司Revolut周一宣布，已向秘鲁申请全牌照银行执照，这标志着该全球金融科技企业第五次进军拉丁美洲市场。【原文：Britain's Revolut said on Monday it has applied for a full banking license in Peru, marking the global fintech firm's fifth market expansion in Latin America.】

item.title: 摩根大通因担忧市场过度拥挤下调新兴市场外汇展望
item.description: 摩根大通策略师周一将该行对新兴市场货币的评级从"超配"下调至"市场权重"，称经过一年强劲上涨后，当前短期头寸已处于"超买"状态。【原文：JP Morgan's strategists cut the bank's view on emerging market currencies to 'market weight' from 'overweight' on Monday, saying short-term positioning was now "overbought" following a strong year-long rally.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局就发动机故障问题对约60万辆通用汽车展开调查
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周一表示，已针对通用汽车约597,571辆汽车因发动机故障问题启动召回调查。【原文：The U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Monday it opened a recall query into about 597,571 vehicles from General Motors over engine failure.】

item.title: 特朗普将在达沃斯会见全球企业高管，美国政策成焦点
item.description: 知情人士透露，唐纳德·特朗普预计将于周三在达沃斯会见全球商界领袖。这位美国总统的出席为这场在瑞士举行的全球精英年度聚会蒙上了浓重的政治色彩。【原文：Donald Trump is expected to meet global business leaders in Davos on Wednesday, sources familiar with the matter said, as the president's presence looms large over the annual gathering of the global elite in Switzerland.】

item.title: 库克案可能为美联储提供"原因"保护，或为解雇提供路线图
item.description: 美联储成立一个多世纪以来最关键的独立性考验，本周将在美国最高法院接受检验。【原文：The most consequential test of the Federal Reserve's independence in more than a century of existence comes before the U.S. Supreme Court this week.】
